Classes in org.idmunit.connector used by org.idmunit.connector
AbstractConnector
          This class facilitates dynamic execution of IdMUnit spreadsheet-defined transactions through dynamic run-time type identification (RTTI) and object introspection
BasicConnector
          This class provides a basic implementation of the AbstractConnector class which was introduced to make IdMUnit transactions more generic.
Connection
          Provides the basic interface for an IdMUnit Connector implementation.
ConnectionConfigData
          Holds credential data for the target system
Connector
          IdMUnit 2.0+ interface for IdMUnit connectors.
LdapConnector
          Implements the IdMUnit 2.0 Connector interface.
